channel.title: ::suggestions Command?
channel.description: Basicly how do I make a command that will let players give me suggestions that will appear in i .txt document?

item.title: ::suggestions Command?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“teufel, post:7, topic:362378”]Did that already ty

Edit* Not showing up in suggestions doc.?[/quote]

Create a folder called “suggestions” and the suggestions will be printed there in a text document.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Junes wrote:

suggestions.txt not doc file and if you took mine you would have a perfectly working one

i copied and pasted from my commands because i couldn’t be bothered to rewrite the code but if you added a close bracket at the top an took one off at the bottom you wouldn’t have the errors

item.title: ::suggestions Command?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“suggest”)) {
sendMessage(“Suggestion has been sent”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);

		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions/suggestions.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName + ": " + suggestion);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
		} catch (IOException ioe) {
			ioe.printStackTrace();
		} finally {
			if (bw != null) {
				try {
					bw.close();
				} catch (IOException ioe2) {
					sendMessage("There was an error while trying to send the suggestion");
				}
			}
		}
	}[/code]

You can create a new file called “suggestions” specifically for suggestions or if you want you can change it to which ever location you want by changing this line

bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("which ever location here/suggestions.txt", true));

If I forgot something let me know.

Edit:
The error above, what is your “sendMessage” method, is it sM? or c.sM etc?

Read full topic

item.title: ::suggestions Command?
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

add this into your client.java anywhere where your commands are

    }
if(command.startsWith("suggest"))  {
  sendMessage("Sending...");
sendMessage("Suggestion Succesfully Sent To I weed I!");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

String suggestion = command.substring(8);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“suggestions.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error Suggesting”);
}
}
}

create suggestions.txt file in your server folder
